issue.title: [C++] open_dataset doesn't ignore BOM in csv file when header's with quotes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17382](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17382). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar issues's been logged and fixed as https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14644. But when the csv is with bom and the header's with quotes, such as
```java

"a","b" 
```
as the first line in csv, it will get the first column's name "a" instead of a.
